001package net.tvburger.jdl.linear;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Facade;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Pair;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.basis.BasisFunction;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Optimizer;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Regime;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.loss.Objectives;
011import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regularization.ExplicitRegularization;
012
013import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
014import java.util.Map;
015import java.util.Set;
016
017@Facade
018public class LinearRegression<N extends Number> {
019
020    protected final BasisFunction.Generator<N> basisFunctionGenerator;
021    private final DataSet<N> trainSet;
022    private final Map<String, DataSet<N>> testSets;
023    private final Optimizer<LinearBasisFunctionModel<N>, N> optimizer;
024    private final Regime regime;
025
026    public LinearRegression(BasisFunction.Generator<N> basisFunctionGenerator, DataSet<N> trainSet, Map<String, DataSet<N>> testSets, Optimizer<LinearBasisFunctionModel<N>, N> optimizer, Regime regime) {
027        this.basisFunctionGenerator = basisFunctionGenerator;
028        this.trainSet = trainSet;
029        this.testSets = testSets;
030        this.optimizer = optimizer;
031        this.regime = regime;
032    }
033
034    public DataSet<N> getTrainSet() {
035        return trainSet;
036    }
037
038    public Map<String, DataSet<N>> getTestSets() {
039        return testSets;
040    }
041
042    public Optimizer<LinearBasisFunctionModel<N>, N> getOptimizer() {
043        return optimizer;
044    }
045
046    public LinearBasisFunctionModel<N> fitComplexity(int m) {
047        return fitComplexity(m, Set.of());
048    }
049
050    public LinearBasisFunctionModel<N> fitComplexity(int m, Set<ExplicitRegularization<N>> regularizations) {
051        LinearBasisFunctionModel<N> regression = LinearBasisFunctionModel.create(m, basisFunctionGenerator);
052        ObjectiveFunction<N> objective = Objectives.mSE(basisFunctionGenerator.getCurrentNumberType());
053        if (null != regularizations) {
054            regularizations.forEach(objective::addRegularization);
055        }
056        regime.train(regression, trainSet, objective, optimizer);
057        return regression;
058    }
059
060    public Pair<Float, Map<String, Float>> calculateRMEs(LinearBasisFunctionModel<N> model) {
061        float trainRme = calculateRME(trainSet, model);
062        Map<String, Float> testRmes = new LinkedHashMap<>();
063        for (Map.Entry<String, DataSet<N>> testSetEntry : testSets.entrySet()) {
064            testRmes.put(testSetEntry.getKey(), calculateRME(testSetEntry.getValue(), model));
065        }
066        return Pair.of(trainRme, testRmes);
067    }
068
069    public float calculateRME(DataSet<N> dataSet, LinearBasisFunctionModel<N> regression) {
070        float mse = 0.0f;
071        for (DataSet.Sample<N> sample : dataSet) {
072            float estimated = regression.estimateScalar(sample.features()).floatValue();
073            float target = sample.targetOutputs()[0].floatValue();
074            mse += (float) Math.pow(estimated - target, 2) / dataSet.size();
075        }
076        return (float) Math.sqrt(mse);
077    }
078}
